title: world orbs
body: i just bought the pass for 2018 and received world orbs but i cant seem to open it somehow

replies.body: I changed my client to low spec mode and was able to open it. Hope it works for you guys also.
I'm having the same issue, when I select the orbs in the Loot tab, nothing pops up in the interaction space where it usually shows the "OPEN" option and a blown up image of the crate/orb.
